1: Move the blue triangle B2 towards the right.
2: Move the green traingle B2 upwards.
3: Release the pink triangle block B1 and move the robot upwards.
4: Approach the pink square block B1 with the robot.
5: Move the green triangle B1 to the pink special area SA3.
6: Grab the pink triangle block B1 with the robot.
7: Push the blocks B1, B2 and B5 closer to SA2.
8: Move blue circle B2 towards SA1.
9: Move green square B3 inside SA1 from SA3
10: Turn the robot a bit towards blue circle B1.
